English

This Collection contains 4 of BBC&#039;s high quality DVD Films about the ancient rome. All episodes is produced by 

either Discovery Channel or The History Channel and is all Drama-documentaries.

Colosseum contains the history of Verus, who advance from slave to a Big Gladiator. In Pompeii you experience 

the last horrifying moments of a city who get caugt in the death trap of the mighty volcano, Vesuv. the citizens 

of the town get buried beneath the ashes, smoke and rocks from the volcano. Murder in Rome is about Cicero - who 

was the ancient romes star lawyer.  When he defends his client, Sextus, he get forced into revealing a 

conspiration theory, witch reaches the top of the society, and it can get him killed. And at last - in Julius 

Caesars greatest battles, we experience Caesar and his legionaires&#039; battÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¦e at Alesia against the great 

Vercingetorix. This battle was one of the war histories greatest sieges and was conclusive for the design of the 

western world.
